title: Bitter Greens: Gives a voice to the women behind the beloved fairytale Rapunzel
description: Charlotte-Rose de la Force, exiled from the court of King Louis XIV, has always been a great talker and teller of tales.Selena Leonelli, once the exquisite muse of the great Venetian artist Tiziano, is terrified of time.Margherita, trapped in a doorless tower and burdened by tangles of her red-gold hair, must find a way to escape.You may think you know the story of Rapunzel . . .
author: Kate Forsyth
